ArticleTitle.sentence: A redox factor protein, ref1, is involved in negative gene regulation by extracellular calcium.

event.clue: A redox factor protein, ref1, is involved in negative gene regulation by extracellular calcium.
A redox factor protein, ref1, is involved in negative gene regulation by extracellular calcium.

AbstractText.sentence: A rise in extracellular calcium (Ca2+e) suppresses not only secretion of parathyroid hormone (PTH) but also expression of the PTH gene to ensure constant plasma Ca2+ level.

event.clue: A rise in extracellular calcium (Ca2+e) suppresses not only secretion of parathyroid hormone (PTH) but also expression of the PTH gene to ensure constant plasma Ca2+ level.
A rise in extracellular calcium (Ca2+e) suppresses not only secretion of parathyroid hormone (PTH) but also expression of the PTH gene to ensure constant plasma Ca2+ level.

AbstractText.sentence: A nuclear protein(s) in a wide variety of cells bound to the specific DNA elements (negative Ca2+ responsive elements, nCaREs) in the human PTH gene in sequence-specific and Ca2+e concentration-dependent manners.

event.clue: A nuclear protein(s) in a wide variety of cells bound to the specific DNA elements (negative Ca2+ responsive elements, nCaREs) in the human PTH gene in sequence-specific and Ca2+e concentration-dependent manners.

AbstractText.sentence: Our Southwestern cloning revealed that a redox factor protein (ref1), which was known to activate several transcription factors via alterations of their redox state, belonged to an nCaRE binding protein.

event.clue: Our Southwestern cloning revealed that a redox factor protein (ref1), which was known to activate several transcription factors via alterations of their redox state, belonged to an nCaRE binding protein.

Our Southwestern cloning revealed that a redox factor protein (ref1), which was known to activate several transcription factors via alterations of their redox state, belonged to an nCaRE binding protein.

AbstractText.sentence: The level of ref1 mRNA as well as of its protein was elevated by an increase in Ca2+e concentration.

event.clue: The level of ref1 mRNA as well as of its protein was elevated by an increase in Ca2+e concentration.

AbstractText.sentence: In gel shift assay, anti-ref1 antibody eliminated formation of the nCaRE-protein complex.

event.clue: In gel shift assay, anti-ref1 antibody eliminated formation of the nCaRE-protein complex.
In gel shift assay, anti-ref1 antibody eliminated formation of the nCaRE-protein complex.

AbstractText.sentence: We also found that there was another protein(s) interacting with nCaREs and ref1.

event.clue: We also found that there was another protein(s) interacting with nCaREs and ref1.

AbstractText.sentence: Further, experiments with an antisense-ref cDNA expression vector introduced into cultured cells suggested that DNA (nCaRE)-ref1 interaction led to Ca2+e-mediated transcriptional suppression.

event.clue: Further, experiments with an antisense-ref cDNA expression vector introduced into cultured cells suggested that DNA (nCaRE)-ref1 interaction led to Ca2+e-mediated transcriptional suppression.
Further, experiments with an antisense-ref cDNA expression vector introduced into cultured cells suggested that DNA (nCaRE)-ref1 interaction led to Ca2+e-mediated transcriptional suppression.

AbstractText.sentence: Thus, it is concluded that ref1 possesses transcription repressor activity in addition to its function as a transcriptional auxiliary protein.

event.clue: Thus, it is concluded that ref1 possesses transcription repressor activity in addition to its function as a transcriptional auxiliary protein.
